 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּלֹנִי‎</span> **pronoun** ==a certain one==; Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὁ</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἡ δεῖνα</span> (according to [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] from above √, through an unused noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּלֹן‎</span>, properly ***one defined, a particular one:*** Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, feminine <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>AG i.§ 353 R.c</sup>, voc. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]]<sup>ZW</sup> [[BDB#The|Th]] xxvii. 355; As ***pulpul*** [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>BAS i. 114</sup>), always joined with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַלְמֹנִי‎</span> (properly ***one not mentioned***) in the sense of 'ein ***gewisser*** verschwiegener' ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 106 c, 2</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 150 b</sup>), '***a certain*** unnamed ***one***', i.e. ***such a one***; [[Ruth.4.1|Ruth 4:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבָהפֹּֿה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּלֹנִי אַלְמֹנִי‎</span> sit down here, ***such a one*** (Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὦ οὖτος</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); in the phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקוֺם פ‎</span> the place of ***such a one*** = ***such and such*** a place, [[1Sam.21.3|1Sam 21:3]]; [[2Kgs.6.8|2Kgs 6:8]]. From <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> arose by contraction (or conflation, [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal.82</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּלְמֹנִי‎</span> [[Dan.8.13|Dan 8:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויאמר ֗֗֗ ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְדַבֵּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַפּ‎</span> to ***that certain one***who spake. — II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּלֹנִי‎</span> see below.
